√śrath 'slacken'

present: [9.] áśrathnan  śrathnās  śrathnīté etc.   -- śṛnthati   -- [1.] śrathati  śranthate  ślathati  ślathate etc.  

perfect: śaśrathe  śaśrantha  

aorist: [3.] śiśráthat etc.  śiśrathantu   -- [5.] aśranthīt  aśranthiṣṭa  

[future: śranthisyati  śranthitā  ]

verbal: śṛthitá  ślathita  śrathitvā  śranthitvā  -śrathya  

secondary: causative: śratháyati etc.  śratháyate  ślathayati  ślathyate  śrāthayati  śranthayati  

derivatives: śratha-  śrathar- RV.  ślatha E.+
